column5: Does anybody know how to find out how many USA citizens fish Ontario Canada every year? A friend of mine told me it was around 250,000....does that sound right?
I would think 250,000 would be low.
[font color=green size=3][b]You might try searching the MNR website, they should know how many non-resident licenses they sell.
That figure seems low to me. That's would be a small amount even for lake Erie
